context: The word 'hyönteinen' means insect in Finnish. It is a noun that declines based on case, as shown in the dictionary definition. The plural form is 'hyönteiset'. You can see possessive forms like 'hyönteiseni' (my insect) and 'hyönteisemme' (our insect). There are also many compound words using 'hyönteinen', such as 'hyönteishaavi' (insect net).
